ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1733 — Clinical Trials — Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1733 - CLINICAL TRIALS - Miscellaneous Program) in order to address a discrepancy between the English and French wording of Division 5 of Part C of the Regulations, in response to a recommendation of the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
